item.title: Minda Corporation partners with Sanco Connecting Technology for EV connection systems
item.description: Minda Corporation Limited has signed a Technology Licensing Agreement with Sanco Connecting Technology, China. This partnership aims to enhance Minda's product portfolio in the EV industry by locally developing advanced Electrical Distribution Systems. The collaboration will boost Minda's position in the EV supply chain and offer innovative solutions to Indian OEMs.

item.title: Nvidia plunges almost 10% as global markets fall
item.description: The artificial intelligence chip giant saw $279bn wiped off its stock market value in New York.

item.title: Nvidia $279 billion wipeout — the biggest in U.S. history — drags down global chip stocks
item.description: In the U.S., chipmaker Nvidia plunged more than 9% in regular trading, leading semiconductor stocks lower amid a sell-off on Wall Street.

item.title: European markets lower; tech stocks down 2.6% following declines on Wall Street
item.description: European stocks fell sharply at the open Wednesday, following steep losses on Wall Street Tuesday and in Asia-Pacific markets overnight.

item.title: Nvidia shares slump amid reports US is ramping up antitrust investigation
item.description:
Fall overnight comes after it shrinks by $279bn on Tuesday in biggest one-day drop in value by US company

  • Business live – latest news

Shares in the AI chip designer Nvidia have continued to slide overnight after a report said US authorities were ramping up an investigation into whether the company had breached competition laws.

The company’s shares fell 2.4% in after-hours trading, exacerbating a near-10% drop in the regular trading session that slashed its value by $279bn (£212bn) to $2.6tn, marking the largest one-day drop in history for a US company.

Continue reading...
